title: Available Sites in Macon County
name: Available Sites in Macon County
description:

properties.description: Posted by Phoban250 ACRE site in the Village of Niantic is one mile from I-72 which connects to I-57 and I-55. It also provides access to the Norfolk Southern Railway. All utilities are adjacent to the property.

properties.description: Posted by PhobanIL, 62521, USA88.13 ACRES Property is in two parcels - East side of Rt. 48 is 54.69 acres with 51.59 usable. West side of Rt. 48 is 33.57 usable acres. Located 1/2 mile from Progress City.

properties.name: Eastgate - 10 ACRES
properties.description: Posted by Phoban4405 E. US Route 36, IL, 62521, USA10 ACRES This site is located on State Route 36, is adjacent to a new Super Wal-Mart Center located in the fastest growing retail area in the city. This outstanding 10 acre site has great potential for office use. Additional new development within a quarter mile of the site includes a 12 screen theater, a Kroger store, several restaurants, and a Walgreens.
